name: Space Ninja (songlin-zheng)
description:
Welcome to Space Ninja! This is a 2D platform game. This is a twilight world, and every machine wants to kill you. How could you survive? 

Ninjutsu! Link yourself to the powerful shurikens ------ be like water, my friend! It's hard to meet and also hard to leave. With greater power comes greater responsibility. Go ahead and save the world!
